result.content:
create database db_name;//创建数据库
create database db_name character set utf8;//创建并设置字符集
alter database db_name character set utf8;//修改数据库的字符集

delete from table_name [where condition];//一次删除一个表中的
delete t1,t2...from t1,t2... [where condition];//一次删除多个表中的

update table_name set f1=v1，f2=v2，……fn=vn [where condition];//更新
update t1,t2 set t1.f1 = v1,t2.f2=v2 [where condition];//一次更新多个
